title: Enhancing Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Restructured Curriculum for Advanced Statistics: Short-Intensive Format

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain data analysis procedures with 90% accuracy following a restructured statistical concept sequence (descriptive → inferential statistics → hypothesis testing)
Learners can perform sampling and confidence interval calculations on simulated educational data using smartphone-based tools
Learners can comparatively evaluate the impact of restructured statistical concept sequences on conceptual understanding versus traditional sequences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
